1. Palmer Luckey's Anduril debuts autonomous attack drone in new video  Business Insider
  2. Anduril debuts Bolt, loitering munition on contract with Marine Corps  Defense News
  3. New AI-powered strike drone shows how quickly battlefield autonomy is evolving  Defense One
  4. Anduril Unveils Bolt & Bolt-M  Anduril
  5. Anduril to sell small, affordable drones after success in Ukraine  Reuters
